LanguageData.BuildControlComputer.label: Build a reactor control computer
LanguageData.BuildControlComputer.description: Build a reactor control computer and connect it to the nuclear reactor core using (Controller loom). This console is used to control reactor cores. They can be paired with specific cores by assigning an ID, allowing you to chain connections from core to core. Send a colonist to man the station to access the controls. Multiple controls can be open at the same time.
